Articles.Content:
Please put this post in whatever discussion group is belongs the most to.

In the parts side screen I would like to be able to create my own categories and move items to those categories.

I would prefer if it moves it from its stock location rather than copy it however if that approach would conflict with possible future updates then a copy is fine.
Something similar to what you're suggesting is planned for the next update as part of the editor overhaul.
I believe this is actually coming in the next version isn't it?
This suggestion for the game's development has been moved to Suggestions and Development.
Yep the last couple of dev blogs described how it will work. From what I've seen your request should be entirely covered
